thread.title: Brent From Mastodon Gets High With Jamey From Hatebreed, Shares Sample Of New Music [News]
thread.title_full: Brent From Mastodon Gets High With Jamey From Hatebreed, Shares Sample Of New Music [News]

title: Brent From Mastodon Gets High With Jamey From Hatebreed, Shares Sample Of New Music [News]
text:
Brent From Mastodon Gets High With Jamey From Hatebreed, Shares Sample of New Music Ginger beards! UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 14 hours ago 10 
Mastodon's Brent Hinds recently hung out with Hatebreed frontman Jamey Jasta for an appearance on his podcast The Jasta Show. 
As a bit of a preview, Jamey shared a brief clip of how it all went, featuring the two lads hanging out, getting high, and listening to some fresh Mastodon. 
While we're only looking at a snippet here, the tune included is not one of the two previously unveiled singles off the new Mastodon album "Emperor of Sand." 
You can check out the clip, along with those singles - " Sultan's Curse " and " Show Yourself " - right below. The record is due out on March 31 via Reprise. A post shared by Jamey Jasta (@jameyjasta) on Feb 17, 2017 at 9:06am PST
